# delegate

**Instance Property**

An object that acts as the view controller’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any PKAddSecureElementPassViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddSecureElementPassViewControllerDelegate] protocol. The view controller doesn’t retain the delegate.

## Responding to the life cycle of a pass

- **PKAddSecureElementPassViewControllerDelegate**: The methods for responding to the life cycle events of a Secure Element pass.
